eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
X^{\pm } &=&\left( s\pm a\right) e^{\pm t}\, ,  \label{surface} \\
Y &=&\left( s+t\right)\, .  \notag

\begin{eqnarray}
F\left( s,p\right)  &\sim &e^{-ips}\sim \left( -t\right) ^{ip}\,,\,\ \ \ \ \
\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \left( s\rightarrow
\infty \right)   \label{as} \\

\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \left( s\rightarrow -\infty
\right)   \notag
\

\begin{eqnarray}
V_{F}\left( p\right)  &=&\frac{1}{2ip}\left[ \Lambda \left( s,p\right)
,F\left( s,-p\right) \right] \,,  \label{future} \\
U_{F}\left( p\right)  &=&-\frac{1}{2ip}\left[ \Lambda \left( s,p\right)
,F\left( s,p\right) \right] \,,  \notag
\
